# Notice of Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
## Contract Title: Subscription Package - Procurement & Business Advisory Services, Coaching, Training, and Online Network

### Contract Reference and Business Infrastructure and Networking Services
 **Contract Title:** Subscription Package - Procurement & Business Advisory Services, Coaching, Training, and Online Network
 **Contract Reference Number:** PW-23-01023530
 **Bid Number:** 5X001-22-1007

### Tender Details
 **Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
**Contracting Authority:** Courts Administration Service (CAS)
**Contracting Officer:** Traian Coconetu, Email: [traian.coconetu@cas-satj.gc.ca](mailto:traian.coconetu@cas-satj.gc.ca)

### Background
As per the Treasury Board Directive on the Management of Procurement, the objective is to ensure procurement of goods, services, and construction support the delivery of programs and services to Canadians while ensuring best value to the Crown.

### Purpose
The procurement team of the Courts Administration Service is seeking a service that provides subscription-based access to an online network of public sector procurement professionals, e-learning modules, procurement resources, best practices, and one-on-one support. Additionally, business advisory services are required to deepen knowledge and strengthen capabilities in departmental procurement practices.

### Assessment Criteria
To evaluate proposals, the following criteria will be considered:
* Security requirements: The service provider must hold a valid Secret clearance.
* Essential service requirements:
* The contractor must offer individual secure access to members-only online portal.
* Customized access profiles to an online portal for a period of 12 months with options to renew.
* The online portal must provide:
	+ Procurement and business advisory services.
	+ Discussion groups with procurement members and a Moderator of the Procurement Alliance of Canada.
	+ Info sessions with budget holders (bilingual).
	+ Access to webinars and events.
* Operational and strategic assistance with procurement documents.
* Provision of training and mentoring.
* One-on-one coaching and in-person and/or virtual training sessions for groups up to 200 participants.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization – Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO – AGP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive
